page.title: 09SCHOOL BREAK ACTIVITIES
page.content: IN PRIMARY SCHOOL IN INVERNESS THERE ARE TWO BREAKS FROM CLASSWORK IN THE DAY.DURING THOSE BREAKS MOST BOYS PLAY FOOTBALL AND GIRLS TIG.TIG IS A CHASING GAME.TICK TOCK IS A METHOD OF CHOOSING TEAMS FOR FOOTBALL.FIVE TO SIX YEAR OLDS ENJOY PLAYING SHARKS WHICH IS A CHASING GAME ALSO.HIDE AND SEEK IS THE MOST POPULAR GAME WITH EIGHT AND NINE YEAR OLDS.GIRLS PLAY SEVERAL DIFFERENT GAMES.ONE OF THOSE IS MOTHER MAY I.FOR MOTHER MAY I ONE PERSON STANDS AGAINST ONE WALL AND PLAYS MOTHER WHILE THE REST STAND AGAINST THE OPPOSITE WALL.MOTHER DIRECTS THEM TO TAKE A GAINT STEP WHICH IS A BIG STEP, A LAMPOST WHICH MEANS TO LIE DOWN,A SQUASHED TOMATO OR AN UMBRELLA.THE PLAYERS FOLLOW MOTHER'S INSTRUCTIONS AND AND THE FIRST PERSON TO REACH THE WALL BECOMES MOTHER.
